hero.title: Transparency in Infrastructure, Delivered
hero.subtitle: Access tools, guides, and resources to implement infrastructure transparency in your country. Join the global movement for accountable infrastructure.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search for transparency tools, country guides, case studies...

footer.description: Building transparency in public infrastructure projects worldwide through multi-stakeholder initiatives and data-driven accountability.

home.title: CoST Knowledge Hub
home.subtitle: Leading insight and practical resources to help all infrastructure stakeholders improve transparency and accountability
home.transformationArticle: How to achieve transparent infrastructure transformation in your country
home.transformationDescription: Transparency and accountability are the clearest ways to get around a city, benefiting all users. Community engagement and infrastructure disclosure are the keys to make it happen.
home.disclosureToolkit: Promoting disclosure and accountability: A toolkit of policy options
home.projectMonitoring: Project monitoring in Africa: Evidence and good practice to improve infrastructure outcomes
home.disclosurePriority: Why infrastructure disclosure should be a priority in your country's sustainable development plans
home.modalShift: How to drive a modal shift from private vehicles to public transport, transparency and accountability
home.gettingStartedDescription: Is your city new to infrastructure transparency, or are you new to the Knowledge Hub? We have the overview you need in one place: why the CoST goal is important; the big obstacles you'll face; the key strategies to get there; the key factors for successful infrastructure disclosure for accelerated and action to infrastructure accountability.
home.urbanTransparency: 15¬∞C cities: The what, why and how of urban infrastructure transparency
